lead_paragraph: Manolo Gabbiadini's rapturous welcome at Napoli seemed a world away on Monday as the hapless forward got a two-match ban to add to his recent woes after his red card in the 2-1 win at Crotone.

headline.print_headline: Nothing Goes Right for Hapless Napoli Forward Gabbiadini
headline.main: Nothing Goes Right for Hapless Napoli Forward Gabbiadini

snippet: Manolo Gabbiadini's rapturous welcome at Napoli seemed a world away on Monday as the hapless forward got a two-match ban to add to his recent woes after his red card in the 2-1 win at Crotone....
